verses.roman:
keho kahe, para-vyome nārāyaṇa hari
sakala sambhave kṛṣṇe, yāte avatārī

synonyms: keho—someone; kahe—says; para-vyome—in the transcendental world; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; hari—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; sakala sambhave—all possibilities; kṛṣṇe—in Lord Kṛṣṇa; yāte—since; avatārī—the source of all incarnations.
translation: Some call Him Hari, or the Nārāyaṇa of the transcendental world. Everything is possible in Kṛṣṇa, for He is the primeval Lord.
